text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
Pavilion Gift Company 19062 Light Your Way Memorial Forever in Our Hearts Angel Figurine, 4-1/2-Inch

Product specifications:
Reads "Forever in our hearts"
High quality polyresin construction
Comes in an attractive gift box
Memorial Gift
text.Response A: This beautiful angel figurine makes a touching memorial gift, featuring the sentiment "Forever in our Hearts." Crafted of high quality polyresin, this 4-1/2-inch figurine is delicately detailed and beautifully painted, and comes in an attractive gift box.
text.Response B: This beautiful angel figurine was made with high quality polyresin and is a great way to remember a loved one. The figurine reads "forever in our hearts" and comes in an attractive gift box. It is 4.5 inches tall.

3.displayed_text:
Prompt

Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
Pavilion Gift Company 19062 Light Your Way Memorial Forever in Our Hearts Angel Figurine, 4-1/2-Inch

Product specifications:
Reads "Forever in our hearts"
High quality polyresin construction
Comes in an attractive gift box
Memorial Gift

Response A

This beautiful angel figurine makes a touching memorial gift, featuring the sentiment "Forever in our Hearts." Crafted of high quality polyresin, this 4-1/2-inch figurine is delicately detailed and beautifully painted, and comes in an attractive gift box.

Response B

This beautiful angel figurine was made with high quality polyresin and is a great way to remember a loved one. The figurine reads "forever in our hearts" and comes in an attractive gift box. It is 4.5 inches tall.
